column1: Will try out @NoMansSky this weekend. Maybe reality is just a series of nested simulations all the way down ... https://t.co/DCMr1TVOdL
Would like to thank @nvidia and Jensen for donating the first DGX-1 AI supercomputer to @OpenAI in support of democratizing AI technology
@verge Yeah. Movie still enjoyable due to some great characters, but plot & editing could've been better. Really needed more Joker+Harley.
